flexpy.tags.RtScripture module¶

class flexpy.tags.RtScripture.RtScripture(el, tag_dict)¶

Bases: flexpy.Rt.Rt

A class for FLEx XML elements with the tag rt

Parameters

  • el – the xml.etree.ElementTree.Element object

  • tag_dict – the TagDict object organizing the Elements in the FLEx project
